short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabverse is an opinionated way of managing tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** v0.5.0 updates**

1. resolved annoying bug that when the browser is busy, loading a saved tabverse will sometime save and update the wrong data because of the async update and save conflicts.
2. rewrite of the chrome session saving strategy with simple rules of keep max 14 days (max 64 records each day).
3. upgraded dependency packages to newest versions.

For details, please check the commit history in our github repo.

============

** Made for People Busy with Too Many Tabs **

Tabverse is made for people working with web based tools around projects. It enables you to group your tabs in one window and create a tab-(uni)verse to manage them. Tabverse will remember your tabs, todos, notes, and bookmarks automatically. Thus after finishing your job,  you can you can bravely closing that many tabs, because it is easy for find back with Tabverse.

** Local Data, Your Data **

You focus on working and let Tabverse focus on remembering your workspace. You are master of your data. There is no login, no subscription required to use Tabverse. Tabverse saves all your data inside your local Chrome storage. You do not need an account to enjoy it!

** Free and open source! **

You can use it free by installing from Chrome web store. We also open the source code through our github repo (visiting the website to find it.). Not satisfy on something? Contribute it, or fork it!
